headline: Jefferies Lifts PT on Vistra Corp. (VST) to $241 From $145
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the best stocks to invest in for beginners. On August 11, Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith raised the firm’s price target on Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) to $241 from $145, keeping a Buy rating on the shares. The analyst told investors in a research note that the firm is continually seeing value […]
